@graph.name: Vegan Potato Soup
@graph.description: This thick, hearty Vegan Potato Soup is quick and easy to make using simple ingredients and very budget-friendly too. Enjoy it chunky as is, puree it until smooth and/ or get all fancy with toppings.

video.name: VEGAN POTATO SOUP | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Potato Soup
RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-potato-soup/ 

Whether it’s cold where you live or life has brought some downs that make you crave all the comfort food. This vegan potato soup is medicine for the soul. Super easy, hugely delicious and so filling you can have it as a main course. It’s amazing fresh but it’s even better the next day. So when you make this make lots and know you have some good eating ahead. I like to top it with some
Smoky tofu bacony bits. 

Laura says: "Ok I was skeptical but this was the best potato soup I have tried. Thank you!!"

recipeIngredient: 1 tsp salt (Divided plus more to taste)
1/4 tsp ground black pepper (plus more to taste)
2 tbsp all purpose flour (or gluten-free all purpose flour)
1.5 cup non dairy milk (such as  cashew milk, oat milk or soy milk  or use any other unsweetened creamy non-dairy milk )
3 medium potatoes (russet or Yukon) (Peeled and cut into ½ inch cubes )
1 tsp miso  (Use chickpea miso or omit for soyfree )
green onion, smoky crispy tofu for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil over medium heat in a large saucepan. Add  onions, garlic, celery and carrots with 1/2 tsp salt and sauté 5-7 mins then add bay leaf. Sautee then add flour and sauté for anohter 2 mins. Add in half the milk and mix to pick up all the flour so that there are no dry lumps
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil over medium heat in a large saucepan. Add  onions, garlic, celery and carrots with 1/2 tsp salt and sauté 5-7 mins then add bay leaf. Sautee then add flour and sauté for anohter 2 mins. Add in half the milk and mix to pick up all the flour so that there are no dry lumps

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the miso in the rest of the milk, add that and the rest of the ingredients, mix well, partially cover and cook for 15-20 mins. Once the  potatoes and veggies are tender and cooked, mash and break some potatoes using a pastry cutter or fork.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the miso in the rest of the milk, add that and the rest of the ingredients, mix well, partially cover and cook for 15-20 mins. Once the  potatoes and veggies are tender and cooked, mash and break some potatoes using a pastry cutter or fork.

recipeInstructions.text: Top the soup with vegan bacon or Smoky tofu bacon and chives or green onion. Store the soup in the fridge for upto 3 days
recipeInstructions.name: Top the soup with vegan bacon or Smoky tofu bacon and chives or green onion. Store the soup in the fridge for upto 3 days
